message: Let's be fair, Bob.  I get a bit more to compensate for inflation, but we both win big!
Alice, let's be realistic. This time I get a bit more to compensate for the risk, but you still get a great deal!
Okay Bob, let's split the difference.  This is a good deal for both of us with the time pressure!
Alice, time is running out. This is a very fair offer considering the inflation working against you. Let's close the deal!
Bob, this is getting ridiculous.  Let's just split it evenly and call it a day.  We're both losing out otherwise!
